Me gusta el pollo de aqui

Rating: 4.5/5

Order Details:

Fish and Shrimp over Rice with White Sauce, BBQ Sauce, and a little bit of Hot Sauce
Side of Strawberry Cheesecake
Total Cost: $16-$18
Food Quality and Taste:

NYC Famous Chicken lives up to its name with its delicious and well-prepared meals. The fish and shrimp over rice is a standout dish, perfectly cooked and seasoned. The combination of white sauce, BBQ sauce, and a hint of hot sauce creates a flavorful and balanced taste profile that satisfies the palate without being overwhelming. The fish and shrimp were fresh, and the rice was well-cooked, providing a hearty and satisfying meal.

The strawberry cheesecake, which I had as a side, was a delightful end to the meal. It was creamy, rich, and had a lovely strawberry topping that added just the right amount of sweetness. The cheesecake's texture was smooth, and it tasted fresh, indicating that it was made with quality ingredients.

Portion Size:

The portion sizes are generous, ensuring you get your money's worth in terms of quantity. The fish and shrimp over rice is filling and can easily serve as a substantial meal. The cheesecake portion was also ample, making it a satisfying dessert.

Pricing:

The pricing at NYC Famous Chicken is on the higher side, especially considering that a meal without drinks can range between $16-$18. While the food quality justifies the price to some extent, it would be reasonable for the establishment to include a drink with such meals. A complimentary can of soda or water would enhance the value for money and make the dining experience more complete.

Service and Delivery:

The service is reliable, with orders being prepared and delivered promptly. The food arrives well-packaged, maintaining its temperature and presentation. The staff is courteous, and the ordering process is straightforward, whether done online or over the phone.

Overall Experience:

Overall, NYC Famous Chicken provides a satisfying dining experience with its flavorful dishes and generous portions. The high price point is the only notable drawback, particularly the lack of included beverages for meals that cost upwards of $12-$14. Despite this, the quality of the food makes it worth trying, and I would recommend NYC Famous Chicken to anyone looking for a delicious meal. The consistency in taste and service ensures that it rarely disappoints, making it a reliable choice for a fulfilling meal.

Recommendation:

If you're in the mood for a tasty and hearty meal, NYC Famous Chicken is a great option. However, be prepared for the higher prices and consider having your own drink on hand to complement the meal. Adding a drink to the meal could be a valuable improvement for the restaurant, enhancing the overall customer experience.

Food always made fresh and tasteful. Dishes feel and taste, as if someone cared about what they're sending out. The staff respected me and treated me like family, every time I dropped by. Food was on point. You can't complain with really hot fried chicken on  cold night in New york. The white meat was tender, and best of all, it wasn't too oily, really nice flavor. The staff was friendly should definitely give them a try.
